overview: The star-studded cast is as follows: Troye Jacobs, JJ Jakobs, Jake Harding, Jack Valor, Levi Hatter and Blake Dyson. Historically, we have always been reluctant about filming videos featuring more than 5 models; we felt it would be difficult to coordinate so much hot sex while, at the same time, keep the raw authenticity we are known for. We come at our videos much differently than any other studio in today's gay porn industry.
title: A Colby Knox Christmas
